item.title: Metatable types
item.content:encoded:
Luau:

> Barges into output

> 'Type { @metatable Foo, { } }' could not be converted into 'Foo'

> Refuses to elaborate further

> Leaves

item.title: Telemetry
item.content:encoded: “According to our analytics, no one was using the setting to opt out of telemetry, so we decided to remove it.”

item.title: Hand-holding
item.content:encoded:
Game: depicts hand-holding

Roblox: this game is rated 17+

item.title: Roblox 2:2
item.content:encoded: And on the sixth day God rested, for the damn servers were down anyway.

item.title: Digital carnivore
item.content:encoded: Hipsters, soon: I only consume works from meat-based authors.

item.title: Reservations
item.content:encoded: Discord, Snapchat, Instagram: We’re sorry, all of our lawsuit reservations have been filled.

item.title: Icons
item.content:encoded: When you don’t feel like uploading icons.

item.title: Ice cream
item.content:encoded:
Your cashier gives you three dimes and a nickel as your change. Do you:

  • Put it in the tip jar
  • Put it in the charity bin
  • Put it in a locked safe because it’s so much money you can’t imagine spending it even on something you use every day

— @BoatbomberRBLX, 2:32 AM Â· Aug 12, 2022

??? it goes in the paper cup where it is eventually used to extract exact change when buying ice cream at the drive thru

More accurately:

  1. Buy plugin
  2. It turns out to be shit
  3. Could have been ice cream

item.title: Game engine
item.content:encoded: “I think I’ll just write my own game engine. It will be easy.”

item.title: Maid outfits
item.content:encoded: Maid objects are just tables in maid outfits.

item.title: Handedness
item.content:encoded: Me trying to figure out the handedness of coordinate systems.

item.title: Roblox tough guy
item.content:encoded:
I’ll set your Parent property to nil. I’ll call Destroy on your ass. You must weigh a singleton, because you’re nothing but Debris to me. Your family better connect to your Died event, because I’ll set your Health to 0. You better BindToClose, because I’m about to shut you down.

No need to set BreakJointsOnDeath, I’ll just call BreakJoints directly. We better update your Transparency, because you’re about to become a ghost. Your ancestry is about to change, kiddo. You’re no longer gonna be a descendant of this DataModel when I’m through with you.

And don’t think you’re coming back, because I’m setting your RespawnLocation to nil. You’re gonna be FallingDown, but you wont be GettingUp, because I disabled that Humanoid state. Your thread is suspended, and I’m calling coroutine.close on you. No need to defer THIS task.

The Garbage Collector’ll need several cycles to clean YOU away. Calling GetFriendsOnline on you always returns an empty array. I’ll set your HeadLocked and max out your NearPlaneZ. By the way these insults are licensed under MIT.

item.title: Procrastination
item.content:encoded: Finally I can get back to procrastinating.
